entry.tran: 狡猾的；狡诈的；有手腕的
entry.def: If you describe someone as artful, you mean that they are clever and skilful at achieving what they want, especially by deceiving people.

example.ex: ...the smiles and artifices of a subtle artful woman...
example.tran: 阴险狡诈的女子的笑里藏刀

example.ex: Some politicians have realised that there are more artful ways of subduing people than shooting or jailing them.
example.tran: 一些政客已经意识到有比枪和监狱更高明的使民众屈服的方法。

entry.def: If you use artful to describe the way someone has done or arranged something, you approve of it because it is clever or elegant.

example.ex: There is also an artful contrast of shapes...
Despite some artful editing, the anthology is a weak one.
example.tran: 除了编辑上的一些巧妙之处，这本选集乏善可陈。

means.word_mean: 1. not straightforward or candid; giving a false appearance of frankness;

sentences.sentence: "an ambitious, disingenuous, philistine, and hypocritical operator, who...exemplified...the most disagreeable traits of his time"- David Cannadine

means.word_mean: 2. marked by skill in achieving a desired end especially with cunning or craft;

stems_affixes.type_exp: =skill, joint, trick, 表示"技巧,关节,诡计"

stems_affixes.word_buile: art技巧,关节,诡计+ful充满……的→充满诡计的
artifice技巧+ial表形容词→用技巧做出的→人工的
art技巧,关节,诡计+less无→无诡计的
artist[n.艺术家, 画家]+ry状态,性质→n.艺术技巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 艺术, 艺术品, 技术, 巧妙, 美术
stems_affixes.word_buile: art技巧,关节,诡计→n.艺术, 艺术品, 技术, 巧妙, 美术
art技巧,关节,诡计+icle东西→用技巧做出的东西→物品
arti=art技巧,关节,诡计+fact做出的东西,事实→人造物→工艺品
arti=art技巧,关节,诡计+fice做→用技巧做
art技巧+ist人→n.艺术家, 画家

sentences.cn: 那人使用狡猾的手段获取机密。
